subSections.title: Etymology 1
subSections.text:
{{rfe|zh|Are all these senses related? Some have proposed that these are all derived from the snake sense.}}

; "huge snake"
: Unknown. {{zh-ref|Schuessler (2007)}} compared {{och-l|巴|tr=prâ}} to 
:*{{cog|lo|tr=ŋuuᴬ⁴ kǎ'''baaᴬ³'''|t=a kind of viper, Agkistrodon}}, with {{m|lo|ງູ||snake}} and {{m|lo|tr=kǎ|t=possible animal prefix}}; as well as to
:*{{w|/Bahnaric_languages#North_Bahnaric|Proto-North-Bahnaric}} *'''qbǎyh''' ([[ibid.]]) "snake" - which Sidwell (2011) reconstructed as *'''bəs''' & whose reflexes include {{cog|hal|bèh}}, {{cog|sed|pah}}, {{cog|jeh|bàjh}}, all from {{cog|mkh-pro|*ɓəs||snake}}, whence also {{cog|km|ពស់}}, {{cog|ncb|pai(ch)}} ~ {{m|ncb|pai(j)||venomous snake}} (Shorto, 2006), {{cog|caq|pēch}}.
